dmca.title: Google Gets An Education on Infringement
dmca.body:
Dear User Support, DMCA complaints,

The following communication is to request the immediate removal of http://www.degreeseducation.com from your search engine. The aforementioned website is in blatant violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the website http://www.meriteducation.com, in it entirety.

2.	The offending website is http://www.degreeseducation.com. The offending website has, without permission, copied
